### What do data scientists do?
  * Define the question
  * Define the ideal data set
  * Determine what data you can access
  * Obtain the data
  * Clean the data
  * Exploratory Data Analysis
  * Statistical Prediction or Modeling
  * Interpret results
  * Challenge results
  * Synthesize the results and create reproducible code
  * Distribute results to other people
